issue.description: In clause 5.1.1.4: assignement misspelled should be assignment.
In clause 5.1.1.5: assignement misspelled should be assignment.
In clause 5.1.1.5: The reference path is wrong. group_role does not exist.

comment.description: Fixed. group_assignment shall be pointed by object_role, in the reference path.

issue.description: In normative references: AM must be the component of the AP.These AM refer the ISO 10303-202:1997.

comment.description: The reference to ISO 10303-202 is included as a default reference for all the modules.

issue.description:
The mapping of membership_meaning is incorrect. Th entity group_role does not have an attribute group_role.name
5.1.1.5 membership_meaning
MIM element: group_role.name Source: ISO 10303-41 Reference path: group <- group_assignment.assigned_group {group_assignment => applied_group_assignment} group_assignment.role -> object_role object_role.name
The mapping should be: 5.1.1.5 membership_meaning
MIM element: object_role.name Source: ISO 10303-41 Reference path: applied_group_assignment applied_group_assignment <= group_assignment group_assignment.role -> object_role object_role.name
